attributes.action: Increase the statutory minimum wage for HGV drivers
attributes.additional_details: Very few companies pay extra for working weekends, Bank Holidays or even Christmas which in other sectors workers might get time and half or even double time for. A higher statutory minimum wage for HGV drivers would help make up for this.
attributes.background: We believe HGV drivers are often underpaid, and that the Government should increase the statutory minimum wage for HGV drivers to ensure they receive a fair wage.
